prompt.name: Navigate to the 'About' Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'About' page from the footer.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the bottom of the page', 'Click on the `About Google` link in the footer'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'About Google' page.

prompt.name: Perform a Simple Search
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User performs a search for 'quantum computing'.

input.action: 'Click on the search icon in the header', 'Enter `quantum computing` into the search bar', 'Press Enter'

expected.outcome: Search results for 'quantum computing' are displayed.

prompt.name: Filter Posts by Year
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User filters the blog posts to show only those from the year 2023.

input.action: 'Click on the `Years` button to open the years filter menu', 'Click on the `2023` link from the years filter menu'

expected.outcome: A list of blog posts from the year 2023 is displayed.

prompt.name: Filter Posts by Label
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User filters the blog posts by the 'Generative AI' label.

input.action: 'Click on the `Labels` button to open the labels filter menu', 'Click on the `Generative AI` link from the labels filter menu'

expected.outcome: A list of blog posts with the 'Generative AI' label is displayed.

prompt.name: Navigate to Next Page of Posts
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the second page of blog posts.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the page navigation', 'Click on the `2` button in the page navigation'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the second page of blog posts.

prompt.name: Navigate to Privacy Policy
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Privacy Policy page from the footer.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the bottom of the page', 'Click on the `Privacy` link in the footer'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to Google's Privacy Policy page.

prompt.name: Navigate to Terms of Service
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Terms of Service page from the footer.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the bottom of the page', 'Click on the `Terms` link in the footer'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to Google's Terms of Service page.

prompt.name: Click on Main Logo
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User clicks on the main logo to return to the homepage.

input.action: 'Click on the Google Research logo in the header'

expected.outcome: The user is returned to the homepage.

prompt.name: Open a Blog Post
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens the first blog post from the main page.

input.action: 'Click on the title of the first blog post'

expected.outcome: The full content of the first blog post is displayed.

prompt.name: Check for 'Follow Us' Section
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User verifies the presence of the 'Follow us' section.

input.action: 'Scroll to the `Follow us` section'

expected.outcome: The 'Follow us' section with social media links is visible.

prompt.name: Verify 'OK, got it' button on cookie banner
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User clicks the 'OK, got it' button on the cookie consent banner.

input.action: 'Click on the `OK, got it` button in the cookie consent banner'

expected.outcome: The cookie consent banner is dismissed.

prompt.name: Navigate to the 'Research areas' page
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Research areas' page from the header.

input.action: 'Click on `Research areas` in the header', 'Click on the `Explore all research areas` link from the dropdown menu'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'Research areas' page.

prompt.name: Navigate to the 'Publications' page
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Publications' page from the header.

input.action: 'Click on `Our work` in the header', 'Click on the `Learn more` link under `Publications`'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'Publications' page.

prompt.name: Navigate to the 'People' page
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'People' page from the header.

input.action: 'Click on `Who we are` in the header', 'Click on the `Learn more` link under `People`'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'People' page.

prompt.name: Navigate to the 'Careers' page
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Careers' page from the header.

input.action: 'Click on the `Careers` link in the header'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'Careers' page.

prompt.name: Search and Open First Result
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for 'robotics' and opens the first search result.

input.action: 'Click on the search icon in the header', 'Enter `robotics` into the search bar', 'Press Enter', 'Click on the title of the first search result'

expected.outcome: The full content of the first blog post from the search results is displayed.

prompt.name: Filter and Open a Post
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User filters posts by the 'Health & Bioscience' label and opens the first post.

input.action: 'Click on the `Labels` button to open the labels filter menu', 'Click on `Health & Bioscience` link from the labels filter menu', 'Click on the title of the first blog post in the page'

expected.outcome: The full content of the first blog post from the filtered list is displayed.

prompt.name: Navigate Multiple Pages and Open a Post
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the third page of posts and opens the first post on that page.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the page navigation', 'Click on the `3` button in the page navigation', 'Click on the title of the first blog post on the page'

expected.outcome: The user is on the third page and the full content of the first blog post on that page is displayed.

prompt.name: Navigate to a Deeply Nested Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Quantum Computing' sub-area within 'Research Areas'.

input.action: 'Click on `Research areas` in the header', 'Click on the `Explore all research areas` link', 'Scroll down to the `Computing Systems & Quantum AI` section', 'Click on the `Quantum Computing` link under the `Computing Systems & Quantum AI` section'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'Quantum Computing' research area page.

prompt.name: Verify Social Media Link Navigation
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Google Research Twitter/X page from the 'Follow us' section.

input.action: 'Scroll to the 'Follow us' section', 'Click on the github icon'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the Google Research github page in a new tab.

prompt.name: Search, Filter by Content Type, and Open Post
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User searches for 'AI', filters by 'Publication', and opens the first post.

input.action: 'Click on the search icon in the header', 'Enter `AI` into the search bar', 'Press Enter', 'Click on the `Content Type` button to open a dropdown menu', 'Click on `Publications` from the dropdown menu', 'Click on the title of the first blog post'

expected.outcome: The full content of the first blog post from the filtered search results is displayed.

prompt.name: Navigate to Student Programs Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Student programs' page from the main navigation.

input.action: 'Click on `Programs & events` in the header', 'Click on the `Learn more` link under `Student programs`'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'Student programs' page.

prompt.name: Filter by Year, then Navigate Pages
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User filters posts by the year 2022, then navigates to the second page of results.

input.action: 'Click on the `Years` button to open the years filter menu', 'Click on the `2022` link from the years filter menu', 'Scroll down to the page navigation', 'Click on the `2` button in the page navigation'

expected.outcome: The user is on the second page of blog posts from the year 2022.

prompt.name: Open Post and Return to Homepage
prompt.instruction: go to https://ai.googleblog.com/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User opens the first blog post and then returns to the homepage by clicking the main logo.

input.action: 'Click on the title of the first blog post', 'Click on the Google Research logo in the header'

expected.outcome: The user is returned to the homepage.
